name: TCorrelate
author: Nipype (interface)
description:
TCorrelate, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.afni.preprocess, interface: TCorrelate).
Computes the correlation coefficient between corresponding voxel time series in two input 3D+time datasets 'xset' and 'yset'
For complete details, see the `3dTcorrelate Documentation. <https://afni.nimh.nih.gov/pub/dist/doc/program_help/3dTcorrelate.html>`_

inputs.name: Args
inputs.description: A string. Additional parameters to the command.

inputs.name: Environ
inputs.description: A dictionary with keys which are a bytes or none or a value of class 'str' and with values which are a bytes or none or a value of class 'str'. Environment variables.

inputs.name: Num threads
inputs.description: An integer. Set number of threads.

inputs.name: Pearson
inputs.description: A boolean. Correlation is the normal pearson correlation coefficient.

inputs.name: Polort
inputs.description: An integer. Remove polynomical trend of order m.

inputs.name: Xset
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Input xset.

inputs.name: Yset
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Input yset.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Output image file name.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Output file.
